items.content_html: OllaSeek is a lightweight, offline, local AI chat application designed for seamless interactions without an internet connection. Powered by Ollama, this app allows users to have conversations with an AI assistant while keeping all data private and running locally on their machine.
items.title: IsaacTalb/OllaSeek-Chat-Local: OllaSeek is a lightweight, offline, local AI chat application designed for seamless interactions without an internet connection. Powered by Ollama, this app allows users to have conversations with an AI assistant while keeping all data private and running locally on their machine.

Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
